trans-unit.source: How to safely share a document by email
trans-unit.target: How to safely share a document by email

trans-unit.source: <Instructions for administrators – delete this section before giving to users>
trans-unit.target: <Instructions for administrators – delete this section before giving to users>

trans-unit.source: Use this document as a starting point for your own end-user instructions to help users safely share documents by email.
trans-unit.target: Use this document as a starting point for your own end-user instructions to help users safely share documents by email.

trans-unit.source: Make any modifications that you want to the instructions in the next section, then delete this first section, and give this document to users.
trans-unit.target: Make any modifications that you want to the instructions in the next section, then delete this first section, and give this document to users.

trans-unit.source: The instructions here are for a fictitious company, VanArsdel, Ltd.
trans-unit.target: The instructions here are for a fictitious company, VanArsdel, Ltd.

trans-unit.source: Before you give these instructions to users, either replace the screenshots and instructions so that they show your own organization name, or modify the instructions to let users know that wherever the instructions refer to VanArsdel, Ltd, they will see their own company name.
trans-unit.target: Before you give these instructions to users, either replace the screenshots and instructions so that they show your own organization name, or modify the instructions to let users know that wherever the instructions refer to VanArsdel, Ltd, they will see their own company name.

trans-unit.source: Other customizations you might want to make:
trans-unit.target: Other customizations you might want to make:

trans-unit.source: In step 2, we suggest just two of the available options if sending to people outside the organization.
trans-unit.target: In step 2, we suggest just two of the available options if sending to people outside the organization.

trans-unit.source: You might want to change these suggestions.
trans-unit.target: You might want to change these suggestions.

trans-unit.source: In step 2, we suggest descriptions to help users identify which template to select.
trans-unit.target: In step 2, we suggest descriptions to help users identify which template to select.

trans-unit.source: You might want to change these descriptions to be more specific or meaningful for your business and users.
trans-unit.target: You might want to change these descriptions to be more specific or meaningful for your business and users.

trans-unit.source: In step 3, we suggest Allow me to instantly revoke access to these documents for the Viewer – View Only option, as an example for when you might want to include this configuration option for users.
trans-unit.target: In step 3, we suggest Allow me to instantly revoke access to these documents for the Viewer – View Only option, as an example for when you might want to include this configuration option for users.

trans-unit.source: However, you might decide that users should always select this option whenever they send the document to somebody outside the organization, or never select this option.
trans-unit.target: However, you might decide that users should always select this option whenever they send the document to somebody outside the organization, or never select this option.

trans-unit.source: In step 4, we suggest the option Email me when somebody tries to open this document.
trans-unit.target: In step 4, we suggest the option Email me when somebody tries to open this document.

trans-unit.source: If users track their documents by using the document tracking portal, you might decide that email notification is not necessary and delete this step.
trans-unit.target: If users track their documents by using the document tracking portal, you might decide that email notification is not necessary and delete this step.

trans-unit.source: For more information about each of the options that users can select, see <link><linkText>Dialog box options for the Rights Management sharing application</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: For more information about each of the options that users can select, see <link><linkText>Dialog box options for the Rights Management sharing application</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: For the user instructions to work, the following must be in place:
trans-unit.target: For the user instructions to work, the following must be in place:

trans-unit.source: Check
trans-unit.target: Check

trans-unit.source: Requirement
trans-unit.target: Requirement

trans-unit.source: If you need more information
trans-unit.target: If you need more information

trans-unit.source: You have prepared accounts and groups for Azure Active Directory
trans-unit.target: You have prepared accounts and groups for Azure Active Directory

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Preparing for Azure Rights Management</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Preparing for Azure Rights Management</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Azure Rights Management is activated
trans-unit.target: Azure Rights Management is activated

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Activating Azure Rights Management</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Activating Azure Rights Management</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: The Rights Management sharing application is deployed to users’ computers that run Windows
trans-unit.target: The Rights Management sharing application is deployed to users’ computers that run Windows

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Automatic deployment for the Microsoft Rights Management sharing application</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Automatic deployment for the Microsoft Rights Management sharing application</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: If you’re using Exchange Server rather than Exchange Online:<html></html><html></html>- The RMS connector is deployed and Exchange Server roles are configured to use it
trans-unit.target: If you’re using Exchange Server rather than Exchange Online:<html></html><html></html>- The RMS connector is deployed and Exchange Server roles are configured to use it

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Deploying the Azure Rights Management Connector</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Deploying the Azure Rights Management Connector</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Users use Outlook from Office 2010.
trans-unit.target: Users use Outlook from Office 2010.

trans-unit.source: If users have Office 2013, replace the screenshots with equivalent versions so that they match what users see.
trans-unit.target: If users have Office 2013, replace the screenshots with equivalent versions so that they match what users see.

trans-unit.source: You have configured custom templates as described next
trans-unit.target: You have configured custom templates as described next

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Configuring Custom Templates for Azure Rights Management</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Configuring Custom Templates for Azure Rights Management</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: To configure the custom templates:
trans-unit.target: To configure the custom templates:

trans-unit.source: Archive the 2 default templates.
trans-unit.target: Archive the 2 default templates.

trans-unit.source: Create 3 new templates by copying the default templates and making the following changes:
trans-unit.target: Create 3 new templates by copying the default templates and making the following changes:

trans-unit.source: Template to copy
trans-unit.target: Template to copy

trans-unit.source: New name
trans-unit.target: New name

trans-unit.source: New description
trans-unit.target: New description

trans-unit.source: Grant these custom rights
trans-unit.target: Grant these custom rights

trans-unit.source: Other settings
trans-unit.target: Other settings

trans-unit.source: - Confidential View Only
trans-unit.target: - Confidential View Only

trans-unit.source: Highly Confidential -
trans-unit.target: Highly Confidential -

trans-unit.source: All users of <organization name> have view and edit rights.
trans-unit.target: All users of <organization name> have view and edit rights.

trans-unit.source: No offline access.
trans-unit.target: No offline access.

trans-unit.source: View ContentSave FileEdit Content
trans-unit.target: View ContentSave FileEdit Content

trans-unit.source: Update the name and description for the languages that users use.For content expiration: Keep the default of Content never expiresFor offline access: Select Content is available only with an Internet connection
trans-unit.target: Update the name and description for the languages that users use.For content expiration: Keep the default of Content never expiresFor offline access: Select Content is available only with an Internet connection

trans-unit.source: - Confidential View Only
trans-unit.target: - Confidential View Only

trans-unit.source: Confidential -
trans-unit.target: Confidential -

trans-unit.source: All users of <organization name> have view and edit rights.
trans-unit.target: All users of <organization name> have view and edit rights.

trans-unit.source: View ContentSave FileEdit Content
trans-unit.target: View ContentSave FileEdit Content

trans-unit.source: Update the name and description for the languages that users use.For content expiration: Keep the default of Content never expiresFor offline access: Select Number of days the content is available without an Internet connection and type 1
trans-unit.target: Update the name and description for the languages that users use.For content expiration: Keep the default of Content never expiresFor offline access: Select Number of days the content is available without an Internet connection and type 1

trans-unit.source: - Confidential
trans-unit.target: - Confidential

trans-unit.source: Internal -
trans-unit.target: Internal -

trans-unit.source: All users of <organization name> have full rights, but cannot unprotect the content.
trans-unit.target: All users of <organization name> have full rights, but cannot unprotect the content.

trans-unit.source: View ContentSave FileEdit ContentCopy and Extract ContentPrint
trans-unit.target: View ContentSave FileEdit ContentCopy and Extract ContentPrint

trans-unit.source: Update the name and description for the languages that users use.For content expiration: Keep the default of Content never expiresFor offline access: Keep the default of Number of days the content is available without an Internet connection and keep the default value of 7
trans-unit.target: Update the name and description for the languages that users use.For content expiration: Keep the default of Content never expiresFor offline access: Keep the default of Number of days the content is available without an Internet connection and keep the default value of 7

trans-unit.source: Publish the 3 new templates.
trans-unit.target: Publish the 3 new templates.

trans-unit.source: <User instructions start here, delete this title>
trans-unit.target: <User instructions start here, delete this title>

trans-unit.source: From now on, whenever you send an important document to somebody by email, use these instructions to help prevent the document from being read by people who should not see it.
trans-unit.target: From now on, whenever you send an important document to somebody by email, use these instructions to help prevent the document from being read by people who should not see it.

trans-unit.source: Create your email message by specifying the email address or addresses, type your message, and attach the file that you want to safely share.
trans-unit.target: Create your email message by specifying the email address or addresses, type your message, and attach the file that you want to safely share.

trans-unit.source: Then, on the Message tab, in the RMS group, click Share Protected and then click Share Protected again:
trans-unit.target: Then, on the Message tab, in the RMS group, click Share Protected and then click Share Protected again:

trans-unit.source: In the share protected dialog box, specify the following:
trans-unit.target: In the share protected dialog box, specify the following:

trans-unit.source: When you send a document to at least one person who works for another organization:
trans-unit.target: When you send a document to at least one person who works for another organization:

trans-unit.source: If this applies …
trans-unit.target: If this applies …

trans-unit.source: Do this:
trans-unit.target: Do this:

trans-unit.source: Generic Protection is automatically selected for you    →
trans-unit.target: Generic Protection is automatically selected for you    →

trans-unit.source: Keep this selection:<html></html><html></html><linkText></linkText>
trans-unit.target: Keep this selection:<html></html><html></html><linkText></linkText>

trans-unit.source: Information in the document should not be changed →
trans-unit.target: Information in the document should not be changed →

trans-unit.source: Select Viewer – View Only:
trans-unit.target: Select Viewer – View Only:

trans-unit.source: Information in the document can be changed →
trans-unit.target: Information in the document can be changed →

trans-unit.source: Select Co-Author – View, Edit, Copy and Print:
trans-unit.target: Select Co-Author – View, Edit, Copy and Print:

trans-unit.source: When you send a document to people inside your organization:
trans-unit.target: When you send a document to people inside your organization:

trans-unit.source: If this applies …
trans-unit.target: If this applies …

trans-unit.source: Do this:
trans-unit.target: Do this:

trans-unit.source: Generic Protection is automatically selected for you    →
trans-unit.target: Generic Protection is automatically selected for you    →

trans-unit.source: Keep this selection:<html></html><html></html><linkText></linkText>
trans-unit.target: Keep this selection:<html></html><html></html><linkText></linkText>

trans-unit.source: Information in the document is very sensitive and would cause exceptionally high damage to the organization or to its employees if publicly available →
trans-unit.target: Information in the document is very sensitive and would cause exceptionally high damage to the organization or to its employees if publicly available →

trans-unit.source: Select Highly Confidential - VanArsdel, Ltd:
trans-unit.target: Select Highly Confidential - VanArsdel, Ltd:

trans-unit.source: Information in the document is sensitive and would cause damage to the organization or to its employees if publicly available →
trans-unit.target: Information in the document is sensitive and would cause damage to the organization or to its employees if publicly available →

trans-unit.source: Select Confidential - VanArsdel, Ltd:
trans-unit.target: Select Confidential - VanArsdel, Ltd:

trans-unit.source: Information in the document should not be shared with people outside your organization but does not contain sensitive information about the organization or its employees →
trans-unit.target: Information in the document should not be shared with people outside your organization but does not contain sensitive information about the organization or its employees →

trans-unit.source: Select Internal – VanArsdel, Ltd:
trans-unit.target: Select Internal – VanArsdel, Ltd:

trans-unit.source: If you selected Viewer – View Only: Select Allow me to instantly revoke access to these documents:
trans-unit.target: If you selected Viewer – View Only: Select Allow me to instantly revoke access to these documents:

trans-unit.source: Select Email me when somebody tries to open these documents:
trans-unit.target: Select Email me when somebody tries to open these documents:

trans-unit.source: Click Send Now:
trans-unit.target: Click Send Now:

trans-unit.source: When somebody you’ve sent a protected document to receives the email, they see a message that gives them instructions how to read it.
trans-unit.target: When somebody you’ve sent a protected document to receives the email, they see a message that gives them instructions how to read it.

trans-unit.source: They can read it on many devices, including iPads, iPhones, Android tablets and phones, Mac computers, and Windows computers.
trans-unit.target: They can read it on many devices, including iPads, iPhones, Android tablets and phones, Mac computers, and Windows computers.

trans-unit.source: To track whether the people you’ve sent protected documents to have accessed them, use the <link><linkText>document tracking site</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To track whether the people you’ve sent protected documents to have accessed them, use the <link><linkText>document tracking site</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Need help?
trans-unit.target: Need help?

trans-unit.source: For additional information:
trans-unit.target: For additional information:

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Protect a file that you share by email</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Track and revoke your documents</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Track and revoke your documents</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.target: Contact the help desk:
